channel.title: clansuite.com Google Group
channel.description: Clansuite - just a eSport CMS! Google Groups of the Clansuite Project, which is just another content-management-system written in PHP, but this one is state-of-the-art and especially for esports teams. Based on PHP5, Doctrine, Smarty, Ajax. - Easy, comfortable, fast, flexible.

item.title: Clansuite Community Toolbar v1.0 (01.07.2011)
item.description:
Hello,

i am happy to announce the immediate release of "Clansuite Toolbar "
version 1.0 (01.07.2011).
This release adresses minor UTF-8 issues within the localization
files.
Also several links were updated, because of ever changing URLs.
Last but not least: the link to our continuous integration server was
item.author: knd.v...@gmail.com (vain)

item.title: Clansuite Community Toolbar v0.9 (12.04.2011)
item.description:
Hello,

we are happy to announce that our "Clansuite Toolbar" was updated
recently to Version 0.9 (12.04.2011).
This release addresses several compatibility issues with Firefox 4.
You may now search for code via Google, Koders, Krugle and Github.
We also made a huge step forward regarding the localization.
item.author: knd.v...@gmail.com (vain)

item.title: Clansuite Community Toolbar v0.8 (08.03.2010)
item.description:
Hi folks,
our "Clansuite Community Toolbar" was updated recently to Version 0.8
(08.03.2010). This release addresses minor product issues.
Florian Wolf (xsign) did a good job in fixing the default preferences
and updating several references to links and images.
The Toolbar is kept up-to-date by Firefox itself.
item.author: knd.v...@gmail.com (vain)

item.title: Clansuite Serverpack for Windows v1.7.3 (07.02.2010)
item.description:
Hi folks,
there is a new version of the Clansuite Serverpack for Windows
available (07.02.2010). It's an integrated Serverpack, combining the
latest release of XAMPPLite 1.7.3 and Clansuite (0.2alpha dev) SVN-
Revision 4068.
This release of the serverpack uses the new build script
for the windows environment created by Florian 'xsign.dll' Wolf .
item.author: knd.v...@gmail.com (vain)

item.title: Clansuite Community Toolbar v0.7 (11.12.2009)
item.description:
Hi folks,

our "Clansuite Community Toolbar" was updated recently to Version 0.7
(11.12.2009). This release brings two new features.
I added language support for the menuitems in "Search" and
"Documentation".
You can set the language in the options dialog ("Options" >
Tab:Language).
The menuitems in "GoTo" have vhost-support now.
item.author: knd.v...@gmail.com (vain)

item.title: Clansuite Community Toolbar v0.6 (22.06.2009) released
item.description:
Hi folks,

our "Clansuite Community Toolbar" was updated recently to Version 0.6
(22.06.2009). This release addresses a compatibility issue with
Firefox version 3.5 and higher.
A new menuitem ("Bugtracker" > "Your tasks") was added. If you are
developer and logged in on Trac, it will provide a quick link to the
item.author: knd.v...@gmail.com (vain)

item.title: Clansuite Community Toolbar v0.4 (21.01.2009)
item.description:
Hi folks,

our "Clansuite Community Toolbar" was updated recently to Version 0.4
(21.01.2009). I added the Autoupdate Feature for Firefox Addons.
With this release the Toolbar is kept up-to-date by Firefox itself.

Check it out: [link]
Provide feedback: [link]
item.author: knd.v...@gmail.com (vain)

item.title: Check out our Community Toolbar
item.description:
Hello Folks,

the Comunity Toolbar was developed with the intention to provide some
quick-links to often needed resources of the Clansuite Project. So
basically all essential project links are kept in this central place.
So please check it out and provide feedback in our forums ( Link to
the Thread: [link] ).
item.author: knd.v...@gmail.com (vain)
